description:
""""The only problem with Microsoft is they just have no taste. They have absolutely no taste. And I don't mean that in a small way, I mean that in a big way, in the sense that they don't think of original ideas, and they don't bring much culture into their products,"""" said Jobs.

I'm old enough to remember @thisisbillgates building his business by copying everything Apple.

Bill Gates is literally China.
